D

database - package database
 
DatabaseAccess - Class in database
Java class responsible to connecting to the database component of the system and executing the commands.
DatabaseAccess() - Constructor for class database.DatabaseAccess
Empty constructor for the DatabaseAccess object
DatabaseAccessTest - Class in database
 
DatabaseAccessTest() - Constructor for class database.DatabaseAccessTest
 
DatabaseCon - Interface in database
 
DatabaseConnectionTier2 - Class in server
Java class used in transmitting information and commands to another component of the system through Sockets(using a TCP protocol), for execution and receiving the result of the action;
DatabaseConnectionTier2() - Constructor for class server.DatabaseConnectionTier2
Empty constructor
DatabaseConnectionTier3 - Class in model
Java class used in reading/receiving and writing/data through the Socket connection established between the different components of the system; It implements the Runnable and DatabaseCon interface;
DatabaseConnectionTier3() - Constructor for class model.DatabaseConnectionTier3
Constructor of the DatabaseConnectionTier3 object; Initiates the DatabaseCon as a DatabaseAccess object;
DatabaseConnectionTier3(Socket) - Constructor for class model.DatabaseConnectionTier3
 
declineInvite(Invitation) - Method in class database.DatabaseAccess
Method used to change the status of an invitation to "declined" Procedure: Enables the connection to the database; Sends the command in SQL format; Closes the connection; IF the command has been executed with no issues the method will return "success" and "fail" otherwise
declineInvite(Invitation) - Method in interface database.DatabaseCon
 
declineInvite(Invitation) - Method in class model.DatabaseConnectionTier3
References the DatabaseCon variable to change the status of the Invitation parameter in the system to "declined"; The method returns a string reflecting the success of the procedure;
domain - package domain
